cards.rules_text:
When Israfil enters, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever you sacrifice a Human, put a -1/-1 counter on Israfil.

When Naki enters, draw a card.
As long as you control five or more creatures, other creatures you control get +1/+1 and have “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to an opponent, create a tapped 1/1 white Human creature token.”

First strike, vigilance
When Yin enters, you may have it consume. If you do, opponents can't cast noncreature spells until the end of your next turn. [i](To consume, sacrifice another creature or exile a creature card from your graveyard.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:

Deathtouch
When Big Bird enters, search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.

Trample
